meta.name: Icefall
meta.description: A young Indigenous game warden arrests an infamous poacher only to discover that the poacher knows the location of a plane carrying millions of dollars that has crashed in a frozen lake. When a group of criminals and dirty cops are alerted to the poacherâ€™s whereabouts, the warden and the poacher team up to fight back and escape across the treacherous lake before the ice melts.
